solution.text:
Total Number of People Surveyed : _{{(k+j+l-2 + k+j+l+k+j+k+l+k)+(m+n+o-2+m+n+o+m+n+m+l+k+1)+(m+k+l+m+j+k-2+m+j+k+n+k)+(m+k+l+j+m+k+m+k-2+m+k-1)}}_
Total Number of people between the ages of 20 and 40 surveyed : _{{m+n+o-2+m+n+o+m+n+m+l+k+1}}_

\(P(E) = \frac{Number\;of\;trials\;in\;which\;E\;has\;happened}{Total\;number\;of\;trials}\)

Therefore, the probability of choosing an individual between the ages of 20 and 40:
\( P(E) = \frac{_{{m+n+o-2+m+n+o+m+n+m+l+k+1}}_}{_{{(k+j+l-2 + k+j+l+k+j+k+l+k)+(m+n+o-2+m+n+o+m+n+m+l+k+1)+(m+k+l+m+j+k-2+m+j+k+n+k)+(m+k+l+j+m+k+m+k-2+m+k-1)}}_} = _{{Fraction((m+n+o-2+m+n+o+m+n+m+l+k+1),((k+j+l-2 + k+j+l+k+j+k+l+k)+(m+n+o-2+m+n+o+m+n+m+l+k+1)+(m+k+l+m+j+k-2+m+j+k+n+k)+(m+k+l+j+m+k+m+k-2+m+k-1)))}}_\)

Suppose a person from the group is chosen at random, what is the probability that they are between the ages of 20 and 40? (Enter your answer as a simplified fraction)
